Flash Player is required to watch this video.Install Flash PlayerÂ The Gigastone PhotoFast Evo Plus 64GB 3 in 1 iFlash Drive is an awesome accessory to any device, not just iPhones or iPads.First let me say that this device coupled with the application can do a ton of things: Media Stream, Backup, YouTube, Social Media photo backup,  and of course use as a Flash DriveIs built of high quality materials, compact and solidly built.  You have a  USB 3.0 with a hidden micro USB connector as well on one end, Lightning on the other.  This allows you to connect to any device you want PC/MAC, Android and iOS!  That in itself is just awesome.You can connect to a PC/MAC and load files via USB 3.0 and then take it and connect to your iPhone/iPad and watch movies, listen to music or view photos and documents, and then even flip out the Micro USB to attach it to your Android phone or tablet through OTG.When you first plug the device into your device, it will ask you to go to the App Store and download the i-flashdrive one app, and it is so worth it!The application is robust in every way I could think off, you can browse different media, connect to YouTube, backup the i-Device, link to many many social media for backing up photos and videos (check my video I list all of them).
